title: Splash Screen Image - Initial Entry
custom_preconds: GIVEN a splash screen image has been setup
custom_steps: WHEN a user opens At Bat for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see Splash Screen image

See Figma: https://www.figma.com/design/lfzucITc8R4RtqOQ25G9yP/Mobile-Spec?node-id=10812-378&t=v3WDYAXariRzfdMz-0

custom_expected:
THEN the user will see Splash Screen image

title: Splash Screen Image - Paid User
custom_preconds: GIVEN A splash screen image has been setup
custom_steps: WHEN a paid user opens At Bat
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see Splash Screen image

See Figma: https://www.figma.com/design/lfzucITc8R4RtqOQ25G9yP/Mobile-Spec?node-id=10812-378&t=v3WDYAXariRzfdMz-0

title: Splash Screen Image Delay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a splash screen image is setup
AND sponsorshipImageDelayTime is set to a certain time (seconds)
custom_steps: WHEN a lite user opens At Bat
custom_expected: THEN the splash screen will be delayed for that time in the config (seconds)

title: English Only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a splash screen sponsor image is setup for English only
custom_steps: WHEN a lite user opens At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content: and the device is set to English
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the sponsor image

custom_steps_separated.content: and the device is set to Spanish
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see the sponsor image

title: Spanish Only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a splash screen sponsor image is setup for Spanish only
custom_steps: WHEN a lite user opens At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content: and the device is set to English
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not see the sponsor image

custom_steps_separated.content: and the device is set to Spanish
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the sponsor image

title: English and Spanish Sponsor
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a splash screen sponsor (sponsor A) image is setup for English
AND splash screen sponsor (sponsor B) image is setup for Spanish
custom_steps: WHEN a lite user opens At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content: and the device is set to English
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the sponsor image for Sponsor A

custom_steps_separated.content: and the device is set to Spanish
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the sponsor image for Sponsor B
